meanings.definition: Not arranged in a series or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The nonserials books were scattered randomly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: Her nonserials thoughts jumped from one topic to another.
meanings.sent3: The nonserials puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: His nonserials approach to problem-solving was both chaotic and creative.
meanings.sent5: The nonserials pattern of stars in the sky seemed to form a unique constellation.

meanings.definition: Publications that are not issued in a series.
meanings.sent1: The library had a section dedicated to nonserials like standalone magazines.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonserials over serialized novels for their individuality.
meanings.sent3: The nonserials on the bookshelf seemed to have a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of series, the nonserials stood out like rare gems.
meanings.sent5: The bookstore offered a variety of nonserials, from one-time publications to special editions.
